NSURLRequest  allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess Instance PropertyallowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccessiOS 26.1+iPadOS 26.1+Mac Catalyst 26.1+macOS 26.1+tvOS 26.1+visionOS 26.1+watchOS 26.1+var allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess: Bool { get }Return ValueYES if the receiver is allowed to use an interface marked as ultra constrained to satisfy the request, NO otherwise.

# allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess ](/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest/allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess)

-  allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess 

Instance Property# allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess

iOS 26.1+iPadOS 26.1+Mac Catalyst 26.1+macOS 26.1+tvOS 26.1+visionOS 26.1+watchOS 26.1+

```
var allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess: Bool { get }
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest/allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess#return-value)

YES if the receiver is allowed to use an interface marked as ultra constrained to satisfy the request, NO otherwise.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSURLRequest/allowsUltraConstrainedNetworkAccess#discussion)

Returns whether a connection created with this request is allowed to use network interfaces which have been marked as ultra constrained.
